title: Inception
description: A skilled thief enters the dreams of others to plant an idea deep in the subconscious.

title: Interstellar
description: A group of explorers travels through a wormhole in search of a new home for humanity.

title: The Dark Knight
description: A vigilante faces a chaotic criminal mastermind who pushes the city to the edge.

title: Blade Runner 2049
description: A young blade runner uncovers a secret that could change the balance between humans and replicants.

title: Mad Max: Fury Road
description: In a desert wasteland, a lone drifter and a rebel leader flee a tyrant in a high-speed chase.

title: La La Land
description: An aspiring actress and a jazz musician fall in love while chasing their dreams in Los Angeles.

title: Your Name
description: Two teenagers mysteriously begin switching bodies and form a connection across time and distance.

title: Parasite
description: A poor family slowly infiltrates the life of a wealthy household with unexpected consequences.

title: Whiplash
description: A young drummer enters a brutal music program led by an intense and demanding instructor.

title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
description: A legendary concierge and his lobby boy get caught up in a stolen painting and family feud.

title: Her
description: A lonely writer develops an unexpected relationship with an advanced operating system.

title: John Wick
description: A retired hitman returns to the underworld seeking revenge after a personal loss.

title: Before Sunrise
description: Two strangers meet on a train and spend one night walking and talking through a European city.
